subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Sherman, a college and pro football coach for 33 years, is bringing his skills to a high school in Eastham, Mass., whose football team went 1-10 in 2015.
snippet: Mike Sherman, a college and pro football coach for 33 years, is bringing his skills to a high school in Eastham, Mass., whose football team went 1-10 in 2015.
